Author: Caraxi
Name: Simple Tweaks
Punchline: This was supposed to be simple...
Description:
A collection of Quality of Life tweaks. Aiming to improve the experience without changing anything drastically.
All changes are toggleable, with everything disabled by default. Visit the Repo for a full list of tweaks. (Globe icon below)
Changelog:
[`Shield on HP Bar`] Added option to customize shield colour
[`Character Directory Command`] Fixed an issue caused by link wrapping in chat.
[`Parameter Bar Adjustments`] Improve performance _(Aireil)_
[`Set Option Command`] Fixed and re-added tweak.

New Tweak: `Auto Lock Action Bars` Automatically locks the action bars when entering combat or changing zones.
New Tweak: `Data Centre on Title Screen` Show's the currently selected data centre on the title screen
